attributes.action: consider, That all Members of Parliment, spend at least a Month, at a Front Line Field Hospital, assisting medics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Help, the Prime Minister, Cabinet Minister and all Members of Parliment, to understand, by hands on experience, the difficulties faced by our Frontline, armed forces and medics. While in a zone of Conflict.

rejection.details: The PM does not have the power to direct MPs in this way. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
